RelatedSentence: Even though Bulgaria is situated on the outskirts of the politically volatile Ukraine / Russian area of the world many people believe that the country is very well positioned for the future .
The 1.21 % decline in flat prices across Bulgaria was the slowest since 2009 and many believe the country is positioned for good growth in the medium term .

RelatedSentence: This leaves the government significant scope to invest in real estate , infrastructure and the overall economy as and when the time is right .
